entry.definition: Average of the angle of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration.

description.p: Average of the angle of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration, with the average being performed over all bond angles and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the square of the angle of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration.

description.p: Average of the square of the angle of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration, with the average being performed over all bond angles and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the length of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration.

description.p: Average of the length of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration, with the average being performed over all bonds and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the squared length of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration.

description.p: Average of the square of the length of a specified bond type in the RMC configuration, with the average being performed over all bonds and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the Kubic Harmonic value for l = 4.

description.p: Average of the l = 10 value of the Kubic harmonic function, given for each specified bond. The definition is K4 = sqrt(21)*(5*Q-3)/4, where Q = x^4 + y^4 + z^4, and S = (xyz)^2. The average is obtained over all bonds of the same type and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the Kubic Harmonic value for l = 6.

description.p: Average of the l = 10 value of the Kubic harmonic function, given for each specified bond. The definition is K6 = sqrt(6.5)*(462*S + 21*Q - 17)/8, where Q = x^4 + y^4 + z^4, and S = (xyz)^2. The average is obtained over all bonds of the same type and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the Kubic Harmonic value for l = 8.

description.p: Average of the l = 8 value of the Kubic harmonic function, given for each specified bond. The definition is K8 = sqrt(561)*(65*Q^2 - 208*S - 94*Q + 33)/32, where Q = x^4 + y^4 + z^4, and S = (xyz)^2. The average is obtained over all bonds of the same type and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the Kubic Harmonic value for l = 10.

description.p: Average of the l = 10 value of the Kubic harmonic function, given for each specified bond. The definition is K10 = sqrt(227.5)*(7106*Q*S + 187*Q^2 - 3190*S - 264*Q + 85)/64, where Q = x^4 + y^4 + z^4, and S = (xyz)^2. The average is obtained over all bonds of the same type and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the spherical harmonic combination i(Y1,-1 + Y1,1).

description.p: Average of the spherical harmonic combination i(Y1,-1 + Y1,1)/sqrt(2). The average is obtained over all bonds of the same type and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the spherical harmonic Y(1,0).

description.p: Average of the spherical harmonic Y(1,0). The average is obtained over all bonds of the same type and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: Average of the spherical harmonic combination (Y1,-1 - Y1,1)/sqrt(2).

description.p: Average of the spherical harmonic combination (Y1,-1 - Y1,1). The average is obtained over all bonds of the same type and over the number of steps specified by the print option.

entry.definition: CPU time taken by the rmcprofile job.

description.p: CPU time taken by the rmcprofile job.

entry.definition: Number of atoms per unit volume.

description.p: Number of atoms per unit volume.

entry.definition: Scattering vector.

description.p: Scattering vector, the variable that defines functions in reciprocal space.

entry.definition: Interatomic distance.

description.p: Interatomic distance, the variable that defines pair distribution functions in real space.

entry.definition: PDF type in input data.

description.p: Specifies the type of PDF in the input data. Options are G(r), D(r) and T(r), and normalised or scaled by the scattering lengths and concentrations of atomic species.

entry.definition: PDF type using in the rmcprofile fitting.

description.p: Specifies the type of PDF in the rmcprofile fitting. Options are G(r), D(r) and T(r), and normalised or scaled by the scattering lengths and concentrations of atomic species. This specifies the form of the PDF data in the output files.

entry.definition: Type of neutron scattering function in input data.

description.p: Specifies the type of neutron scattering function in the input data. Options are F(Q), i(Q), S(Q), QF(Q) and Qi(Q), and normalised or scaled by the scattering lengths and concentrations of atomic species.

entry.definition: Type of neutron scattering function used in the rncprofile fitting.

description.p: Specifies the type of neutron scattering function used in the rncprofile fitting. Options are F(Q), i(Q), S(Q), QF(Q) and Qi(Q), and normalised or scaled by the scattering lengths and concentrations of atomic species.

entry.definition: Number of different atomic species in the RMC configuration.

description.p: Number of different atomic species in the RMC configuration.

entry.definition: Labels for the different atoms types

description.p: Labels for the different atom types, with order consistent with the order of atoms in the configuration file.

entry.definition: Numbers of atoms of each type

description.p: Numbers of atoms of each type, in order of atoms in the configuration

entry.definition: Number of coordination restraints

description.p: Number of coordination restraints

entry.definition: Number of mean coordination restraints

description.p: Number of mean coordination restraints

entry.term: Number of neutron real-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of neutron real-space data sets

description.p: Number of neutron pair distrubution function data sets, whether G(r), D(r) or T(r)

entry.term: Number of neutron real-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of neutron real-space data sets

description.p: Number of neutron pair distrubution function data sets, whether G(r), D(r) or T(r)

entry.term: Number of neutron reciprocal-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of neutron reciprocal-space data sets

description.p: Number of neutron total scattering intensity data sets, whether S(Q), i(Q) or Qi(Q)

entry.term: Number of X-ray reciprocal-space data sets
entry.definition: Number of X-ray reciprocal-space data sets

description.p: Number of X-ray total scattering intensity data sets, whether S(Q), i(Q) or Qi(Q)

entry.definition: Bragg profile background coefficients

description.p: Coefficients used in Chebychev polynomial fitted to the Bragg profile background

entry.definition: Integers that define how the RMC configuration is a multiple replication of the crystal unit cell

description.p: Integers that define how the RMC configuration is a multiple replication of the crystal unit cell

entry.definition: Parameter that gives the relative weighting of the Bragg profile data to the overall value of chi-squared

description.p: Parameter that gives the relative weighting of the Bragg profile data to the overall value of chi-squared

entry.definition: Flag that determines whether or not to recalculate the hkl list

description.p: Flag that determines whether or not to recalculate the hkl list or to take it from the .amp file

entry.definition: Bragg profile type

description.p: Type of profile function to describe the shape of Bragg peaks in the Bragg profile data

entry.definition: Value of constant offset

description.p: Array of values of the constant offset to apply to scattering data

entry.definition: Flag to determine whether or not to apply a data offset

description.p: Array of flags that determine whether or not to apply offsets to the neutron scattering data

entry.definition: Flag to determine whether or not to renormalise data

description.p: Array of flags tha determine whether or not to apply data renormalisation

entry.definition: Matrix of lattice vectors

description.p: Matrix of lattice vectors that define the size and shape of the configuration, expressed in cartesian coordinates

entry.definition: Array of neighbour atom closest approach distances

description.p: Array of neighbour atom closest approach distances

entry.definition: Array of maximum atom move distances

description.p: Array of maximum atom move distances

entry.definition: Number of RMC steps between printing steps

description.p: Number of RMC steps between printing steps

entry.definition: Time limit for the job

description.p: Time limit for the job

entry.definition: Period of time between configuration saves

description.p: Period of time between configuration saves

entry.definition: Minimum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint

description.p: Array of minimum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint, one per atom pair

entry.definition: Maximum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint

description.p: Array of maximum distances of approach for neighbouring atoms within the distance window restraint, one per atom pair
